[LOGIC]: Abrupt introduction of modern elements (bluetooth signal, diagnostic tool) in a historical context
[STRUCTURE]: Disjointed transitions between descriptive passages and narrative
[CLARITY]: Overly detailed descriptions that disrupt the flow of the narrative

[GRAMMAR]: sentence structure is sometimes complex and hard to follow
[LEXICON]: some words are archaic or uncommon (e.g. "k'ang", "tshokh", "ch'ih")

[STRUCTURE]: text jumps between different topics (household, clothes, daily life) without clear transitions
[CLARITY]: some sentences are unclear or confusing due to lack of context or ambiguous language
[LOGIC]: text assumes prior knowledge of certain terms and concepts (e.g. "Sarö Yögur", "Khirgis")
